Params: {2: 'Lee', 3: 'This area seems to have more puzzles.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If we force our way through, the large number of Heteromer shards could form enemies like what we saw.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'These puzzles must have an unlocking command...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I know! It's the information from the log data. However...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'These parts have been contaminated by the Punishing Virus and cannot be read.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Of course not. Punishing Virus under Heteromerization has displayed clear traits of consciousness...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Looks like... We have to force our way through...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Excuse me, is that Gray Raven down there?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "You must be the legendary commandant, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Yes, I'm Ayla, a member of the 2nd Archaeological Team.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...She's a very popular young artist in Babylonia. Murray... likes to go to her exhibitions.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I have been wanting to meet you too! Especially...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Oh, I should probably talk about that later. I've got more important things to tell you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "My mission here is to rescue a Construct named Selena. She's a very important friend of mine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Selena already had access to all the information within the database of this space station.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'She said some of it could be vital to you, as it was related to the design of these... rings.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Right. We do need some guidance to help us through.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Okay. But... for some reason, she cannot send the info directly to you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'It has to come to me before I can tell you. Is that alright?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course.', 3: '60', 4: 'Can you tell me the reason?', 5: '63'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Given Selena's current state, she is unable to... explain it in person.", 4: '1'}
